message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $80 to me, and I believe it could be valuable to you as well. Let's start with an offer of $95. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but I'm looking for something closer to $70. I hope we can find common ground.
I understand your perspective, Bob. Considering the value of the product and my position, I would like to offer it to you for $82. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
